news uk-news prince-charles-caught-making-exciting-"Royals arrive at the Commonwealth Day CelebrationByJenner NewtonRoyal Features Writer:,  Mar |comments The Duke and Duchess of Cambridge were among the royal guests at todayaposs annual Commonwealth Day service at Westminster Abbey today. They were joined by Prince Charles - who stood in for the Queen after she pulled out of attending the ceremony - and his we Camilla, the Duchess of Cornwall.Before the procession at the start of the service began, the royal party were able to greet each other with warm hugs and kisses and engage a just a few minutes of chit-chat.And according to a lip-reader, in Charlesaposs short conversation with Kate, the pair appeared to be making some exciting future plans.  Jeremy Freeman, an expert in lip reading told the Mirror, that Charles told his daughter-in-law we are going to pop in and see you all...It would appear the plans were being made for after William and Katefrom their week-long royal tour of the Caribbean later this month.Andthey keep the date in their diaries, it would allow Charles to spend some precious time with his three grandchildren Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Prince Louis.Love the royals for the Mirroraposs daily newsletter to get all the latest news on the Queen, Charles, Kate, Wills, Meghan, Harry and the rest of The Firm. Click here to sign up . Charles is the proud grandfather of five grandchildren. who include Prince Harry and Meghan Markleaposs children two-year-old Archie and Lilibet, who is just eight months.But previously there had been claims that Charles, , was unhappy he did not get to see enough of William and Kate children. In an interview two years ago to mark Charles th birthday, William echoed the sentiment.In an interview two years ago to mark Charles th birthday, Prince William echoed the sentiment.  He said: “I would like him to have more time with the children… to, you know, play around with the grandchildren. When heaposs there, heaposs brilliant, but we need him there as much as possible.”To this end, Kate is said to have urged Charles to visit their home Amner Hall in the summer of  and took on the logistical challenge of getting her family back home from a holiday on the Isles of Scilly to coincide with his visit.In doing so, it was reported that the heir to the throne was able to give his grandson George a seventh birthday present in person. However, he has not seen grandson Archie, since he and his parents Harry and Meghan left the UK for America over two years ago. He is also yet to meet granddaughter Lilibet, who was born in Calornia last June and has yet to be brought to the UK to see her fatheraposs family. news uk-news royals-exchange-kisses-arrive-commonwealth-"Royals arrive at the Commonwealth Day CelebrationByJenner NewtonRoyal Features Writer:,  Mar Updated:,  Mar |comments Prince Charles, Camilla and the Duke and Duchess of Cambridge have attended the the annual Commonwealth Day service at Westminster Abbey - however the Queen has been forced to miss the special day.The Prince of Wales was representing his mother at the celebration after it was announced last week she was to miss it for the first time in almost  years. As they arrived, the royals greeted each other with hugs and kisses. Kate looked resplendent in royal blue and was seen chatting with her father-in-law. The Commonwealth, affectionately known as the “family of nations”, has played an important role throughout the Queenaposs reign, and she takes a special interest in the institution. Highlights of the service at Westminster Abbey, also attended Princess Alexandra, included an address by former archbishop Lord Sentamu, a reflection by young Tongan leader Elizabeth Kite and special musical performances from Emeli Sande and Mica Paris.The service would have been the Queen’s first major public appearance since reaching her Platinum Jubilee milestone in February. But on Friday a Buckingham Palace spokesman said: “After discussing the arrangements with the royal household, the Queen has asked the Prince of Wales to represent Her Majesty at the Commonwealth service at Westminster Abbey on Monday.“The Queen will continue with other planned engagements, including in-person audiences, in the week ahead.” Love the royals for the Mirroraposs daily newsletter to get all the latest news on the Queen, Charles, Kate, Wills, Meghan, Harry and the rest of The Firm. Click here to sign up. She last missed the service nine years ago, in , while recovering from a nasty bout of gastroenteritis. Before that, the Queen had not been absent from a Commonwealth Day observance service for  years, the last time being when she had flu in . However, earlier this afternoon, she did issue her annual Commonwealth Day message, where she renewed her vow of dedicating her le to service. Her decision not to attend the service was taken with her most trusted advisors and is understood to be related to her comfort travelling the -mile journey from Windsor Castle to London and sitting through the event, rather than a specic illness. A royal source said: “The Queen is very aware that with the passage of time must come an awareness of one’s own frailties and we are very much in that moment.“The Queen is still utterly determined to serve to the maximum extent that she can and the renewal of her vow, dedicating her le service, is one that Her Majesty takes incredibly seriously.”Commonwealth Day has not been celebrated in person since  when the Prince Harry and Meghan Markle made their last public appearance with senior members of the royal family before moving to North America.Read MoreRead More Most Read Dont MissFollow MirrorFacebookTwitterComment MORE ON Camilla, Duchess of CornwallKate Middleton, Duchess of CambridgeThe QueenPrince Charles, Prince of WalesCommonwealthRoyal Family" data-immediate"data-immediate"Get our daily royal round-up direct to your inboxInvalid EmailSomething went wrong, please try again later.We use your sign-up to provide content in ways youve consented to and to improve our understanding of you. title: secret symbols chalked walls spark
story: Secret symbols chalked on walls spark fears burglars are about to target homesPeople have been warned by police to look out for the markings which can also be used by utility firms to inform workers of a problems whereabouts in a neighbourhoodMysterious marks have appeared on properties which are used by burglars Image: Getty Images WestendByHayley ParkerGraeme Murray:,  Mar |commentsSecret symbols chalked on the walls of homes have sparked fears burglars are about to target home. Mysterious marks have appeared on properties in Stoke-on-Trent and are similar to others that have been discovered where.People have been warned by police to look out for the markings which can also be used by utility firms to inform workers of a problemaposs whereabouts. But they are also used by burglars to suggest a property is vacant or to indicatesomeone is at home. There have been previous reports where the symbols were being used to flag up expensive dogs or property at a house, reports Stoke on Trent Live.  They have raised concern for some time and in  West Yorkshire Police shared an image of the signs people should look out for. Other Forces including County Durham, Lanarkshire and Devon and Cornwall have also highlighted the issue. StaffordshireLive reports mum Libby Dallimore,  was concerned about the marks. She said: We have an O and Vl outside our house and the neighbours have X X.No dogs either side so assuming itaposs not to do with potential dog-napping but perhaps targeting for burglaries.Similar markings spotted on the terrace houses further down. While the symbols may not be cause for concern, they should be reported to Staffordshire Police on the non-emergency  number. Elsewhere in the country, they have been dubbed the Da Pinci Code with signs for nothing worth stealing, wealthy and good target.  A triangle symbol is used to show a single woman lives in the property on her own, or vertical lines could imply a house has obvious valuables inside.Also keep an eye out for letters ‘M’ which tells other burglars to strike the morning, whereas ‘N’ means a night-time intrusion. The Safeguarding Hub - which shares home protection advice and information across the UK - previously said: Between us, we have a fairly extensive knowledge of burglary.We have spent many hours speaking to distraught victims, visiting crime scenes and dealing with burglars.We have actually seen and experienced these symbols being used by criminals.This is not to say that this is a common practice between bands of thieves, for most burglars work alone. We do not want to scaremonger and we can say confidentially that the use of these symbols is very rare.But,you are a caregiver to an elderly or vulnerable person and spot strange marks outside their home, do you really want to dismiss it out of hand without just ensuring that the symbol is legitimate  Security firm Keytek has also highlighted the issue saying: These ‘robbery markings’ or ‘burglar signals’ are basic sketches and forms that are supposedly used as a ‘code’ to determine whether a house is worth targeting. These illustrations are also supposed to indicate to other thieves what type of person lives at the property, such as whether the residents are vulnerable, elderly, or live in a single-family home. It added: Chalk is the main material burglars use as it is easily removed and not as noticeable as materials such as spray paint markings outside the house.As well as burglar chalk signs, burglars mark houses with almost anything they can it may be a small blob of paint or a piece of string tied around a lamppost!  White and blue spray paint markings outside the house are the most common colours used by burglars.Make sure you keep an eye out for both colour pains to avoid getting burgled! There was also a stint in  mainly found in Dublin where burglars would place clear tape over the keyholes on the exterior access doors.If the tape is left intact for the next couple of days they would know the house is currently vacant! What to doyouaposve been burgled  If you come home one day to find that you yourself have been burgled, there are a couple of steps you must take: Don’t touch anything – although you might want to figure out what has been taken, it could potentially destroy fingerprint or DNA evidence. Don’t walk around the house – again, intruders might have left footwear marks on the floor which crime scene investigators will want to look into If the intruder has left anything behindagain, leave it where it is and noty the officer when they arrive. You’ll be asked to give a police statement as well as any witnesses that were present at the time. The police will then conduct door to door enquiries in the area, take photographs of your house to find out a potential point of entry. Theyaposll also look into any CCTV footage in the area and look for any DNA evidence in your home to help determine the culprit. title: solar storm set light up
story: Solar storm set to light up skies in direct hit and it could happen any time this weekPeople across the world may be able to see the Aurora, a light show that is often seen in high latitude areas, this is expected to be seen further towards the equator during the stormScientists have predicted the exact time a solar storm will hit Earth Image: Getty Images Science Photo Library RFByJaimie KayAlahna KindredNews Reporter:,  Mar |commentsExperts have predicted the exact time a solar storm will hit Earth this month. Physicists say the storm is likely to happen in the next couple of weeks. These predictions have been made based on data collected from NASA and the US-based National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration . The NOAA has predicted there is an  per cent chance of the storm will hit as soon as today. The chances of the storm hitting the UK is  per cent.However, Dr Tamitha Skov, a space weather physicist, says the storm is already here.A solar blast, also known as a Coronal Mass Injection , are very common and not all of them travel towards the Earth, but when they do - they have the power to be disruptive. Some flares can reach speeds of between km-,km a second, according to the US Space Weather Prediction Center .People across the world may be able to see the Aurora, a light show that is often seen in high latitude areas, this is expected to be seen further towards the equator during the storm. Issues can also be expected for amateur radio and GPS systems, particularly near dawn and dusk.  Dr Skov tweeted yesterday: Direct Hit! NOAA  NASA prediction models show solar storm to hit Earth between : and : UTC on March . Impact should be strong! Expect aurora deep into mid-latitudes, amateur radio  GPS reception issues, especially near dawn dusk, and on Earthaposs nightside! She added on Monday morning: Solarstorm  Aurora -day Outlook: Busy week with a triple threat! A big solar storm is coming sandwiched between a glancing blow from a previous solar storm and some fast solar wind. A relatively weak C-class solar flare blasted from the earth-facing side of the Sun on Thursday last week.  While Dr Tony Phillips of spaceweather stated that these flares are usually unremarkable, this one lasted for nearly  hours. Coronal Mass Ejectionsare powerful eruptions of plasma on the Sunaposs surface. Billions of tons of material are lted off the surface and can explode away from the Sun with the force of around  million nuclear explosions. Scientists donapost quite yet understand what causes CMEaposs, but do believe that it is something to do with the Sunaposs magnetic field. EarthSky.org explained: Because the sun is a fluid, turbulence tends to twist the magnetic field into complex contortions. Twist the field too much, and it kinks, much like a phone cord or toy Slinky. These kinks snap the magnetic field and can potentially drive vast amounts of plasma into space. title: uk weather forecast hotter spanish
story: UK weather forecast: Hotter than the Spanish Costas as country to bask in C heatThe UK is set for warm weather this week with temperatures likely to peak around C making it hotter than popular holiday destinations in Spain including the Costa BravaThe UK is set to enjoy balmy temperatures this week Image: PAByTim HanlonNews Reporter:,  Mar |comments Brits are set for a frosty start to Tuesday but temperatures will soon rise during the day and with highs of C it is likely to be warmer than the Costa Brava in Spain. After a weekend of mixed weather with wind and rain, a spell of more settled conditions is set for the UK this week which started with some sunny spells on Monday.And it is likely to be warmer again on Tuesday especially in the south of the UK where temperatures could get into the mid-teens. A high pressure front is moving north bringing the warmer conditions but how warm it gets depends on when it meets a low pressure that is coming from the north west. On Tuesday morning it could drop as low as -C in central England and it will be low single figures around the UK.  BBC weather forecaster Matt Taylor said: A touch of frost is possible just about anywhere but a bright enough start for many, a few isolated showers through East Anglia and the Midlands, drting their way northwards through Yorkshire during the day.Much of England and Wales ying amounts of sunshine, the best of which will be in the morning. Some sunny spells east of Scotland, Northern Ireland, isolated showers. It is the west of Scotland and the west of Northern Ireland where it will turn wetter, quite breezy for a time during the morning.  That breeze though will help break up the cloud into eastern Scotland. In the sun, balmy conditions can be expected and temperatures could be higher than some Spanish holiday resorts including the Costa Brava where it is unlikely that the mercury will rise about C on Tuesday. Mr Taylor said there would be a north-south ide though in the temperatures with it probably staying in single figures in Scotland.  Temperatures in the north C or C but in the sunshine further south a pleasant spring day up to C or C, he said. Similar conditions are expected for the rest of the week where temperatures will be cold overnight but it will be quite pleasant during the day for most parts of the country. UK forecast for the next  days Some pleasant sunshine for many today northwest corner wet, windy. Today: Early fog patches clearing, then sunny spells for many, especially over England and Wales where feeling rather warm. Cloudier for parts of Scotland and Northern Ireland, where wet and windy in parts of north and west, with coastal gales possible. Tonight: Weakening rainband moving southeast across Scotland and Northern Ireland, clearer colder conditions following. Areas of cloud and rain developing across parts of England and Wales, where it will be milder. Wednesday: Northwest corner bright and fresh-feeling, scattered heavy showers later. Elsewhere often cloudy, showery rain turning heavier across some eastern areas. A few brighter, warmer spells, perhaps focused in southwestern areas. Outlook for Thursday to Saturday: Heavy, blustery showers in the north and northwest Thursday, dry with sunny spells where. Most places fine and dry Friday and Saturday. Chilly mornings, but mild by day. title: we visited new vegan burger
story: We visited the new all-vegan Burger King and the bakon cheeze burger was a winnerFast-food giants Burger King have announced the launch of its first-ever fully vegan restaurant, and The Mirror went down to review the fare at the Leicester Square venueA vegan Burger King branch opened its doors today Image: Daily MirrorByRosaleen FentonDeputy Features EditorZahra Khaliq:,  Mar Updated:,  Mar |commentsA vegan Burger King branch opened its doors today - and we visited the restaurant to test out its new range. The revamped London Leicester Square restaurant is serving fully plant-based fare, including its well-reviewed meat-free Whopper and Royale alongside a aposcheeeze and bakonapos burger. The fast-food chain has told how it plans to serve a % meat-free menu by  - but will customers be interested. The Mirror visited the restaurant today, with one meat-eater and vegetarian in tow to review the limited menu, which is available until April . The fast-food chain has even said it will be keeping an eye on the most popular items on the menu, with a view to making some of them nationally available in the future. Get the news you want straight to your inbox.for a Mirror newsletter here Other options include the Vegan Nugget Burger, a Plant-based Double Cheeezeburger, as well as sides Vegan Chilli Cheeeze Bites.  Our review Clearly, thereaposs a massive demand for vegan products, as we rock up to find a queue of hungry customers snaking around busy Leicester Square on Monday afternoon. Waiting patiently in line, Nicola Jones, from Chichester who turned vegan four years ago after -years as a vegetarian. She told the Mirror: aposWe came up to London for the weekend, saw this and knew that we had to try it.The fact itaposs all meat-free, thataposs really reassuring as you know it wonapost be contaminated. We were surprised to see it so thought we had to support it. Meanwhile, Eleisha Kennedy, who has been a vegan for six years, said she was intrigued by the range on offer despite not being a self-professed fast food fan. She said: My friend told me it was happening so I thought Iaposd nip over from work out of curiosity. I think choices are so much better now, when I turned vegan, Iaposd have to be content with chips and salad. I donapost eat a lot of fast food and Iaposm not too keen on those companies, but itaposs a little treat. Itaposs mostly curiosity.Iaposm most excited about the nuggets, as who doesnapost like a chicken nugget  Tourist Kathy Alvrez, who was visiting from Calornia, said she was always intrigued to try the new vegan fare. She said: I wanted to support this launch, Iaposve been vegan for ten years and menus have changed a lot. Iaposm keen to try a milkshake and chicken nuggets. I would like to try it all. Itaposs nice not having to wonderitaposs actually vegan. Iaposm pretty relaxed but itaposs good to know that itaposs all safe to eat. Meat-eater Rosaleen Fenton and vegetarian Zahra Khaliq visited the new spot - and left seriously impressed Chilli Cheeze Bites Zahra: I can’t tell that the cheese is vegan, it melts beautully and tastes just like the regular chilli cheese bites that you’ll find in regular chicken shops dotted around the UK. It has a slightly spicy kick and salty aftertaste. Rosie: I am stunned by the revelation that vegan cheese can be melty, delicious and have a consistency that doesnapost leave me wanting to vomit. These are a total triumph. The batter is lovely and thin, and it actually has a slightly spicy kick, unlike most high-street products with chilli in it. Vegan Nuggets Zahra: These are very convincing, and similar in style to the Quorn veggie nuggets and McDonald’s chicken nuggets. They have a crispy outer layer, texture and taste very similar to that of a regular chicken nugget, although they have a slight aftertaste of oil. Rosie: The humble chicken nugget could happily disappear off the shelves forever, and I donapost think most meat-eaters would notice. These are delicious, with a nice crispy batter. Perfect to pair with a nice spicy or sweet sauce for dipping. Cheeze  Bakon Whopper Zahra: The tastes just like beef, while the bacon is smoky and tastes very similar to real bacon. When you combine the salad, sauces, bacon and burger patty, it tastes just like a regular beef burger, the ying flavours and textures work very well together Rosie: This was the burger I had the lowest expectations for, but actually it turned out to be my favourite. A total triumph. The aposbakonapos had a nice smoky flavour, while the cheeze was distinctively cheese-like. I would happilyjust to eat this burger.  . Katsu Chilli Whopper Zahra: The blander option of the menu - could be betterit had more of a iety of flavours and textures like the cheese and bacon whopper. Lacks freshnessand was a little burnt, with an aftertaste. Rosie: This wasnapost my favourite. Unlike a meat patty, the vegan burger didnapost hold up that well to being chargrilled. The curry sauce is tasty, but I agree with Zahra, it is crying out for some herbs and crunchy greens, possibly in a zingy dressing. A little bit cloying.Vegan Royale  Zahra: This is supposed to imitate the taste of chicken, the patty is quite flat and the texture is not overly similar to chicken, but overall it is still tasty! Rosie: There are better fake chicken burgers out there, but this is pleasantly tasty, with a nice coating. Could perhaps do with something jazzier than mayonnaise in it, possibly a hot sauce  It feels a little flat, but the bread roll is surprisingly decent. The full meat-free menu includes:Vegan Nugget Burger Vegan Royale Vegan Cheeeze  Bakon Royale Vegan Cheeeze Royale Vegan Katsu Royale Plant-based Katsu Chilli Whopper® Plant-based Whopper® Plant-based Cheeeze Whopper® Plant-based Cheeeze  Bakon Whopper®Plant-based Whopper Jr®Plant-based Cheeeze Whopper Jr®Plant-based Hamburger Plant-based Cheeezeburger Plant-based Double Cheeezeburger Plant-based Bakon Double Cheeezeburger Plant-based Bakon Double Cheeeze XL Plant-Based Double Whopper®Plant-based King Jr® Hamburger Meal Plant-based King Jr® Cheeezeburger Meal Vegan King Jr® Nugget Meal Vegan FriesVegan NuggetsVegan Chilli Cheeeze bites Plant-based Onion Rings Ben  Jerryaposs® Cookie on Cookie Dough Non-Dairy Ice CreamKatie Evans, from Burger King UK said: We’re incredibly proud of our new meat-free menu it absolutely delivers on big taste with no compromises and reflects our ongoing commitment to serving our customers a erse and innovative range of products. The limited-edition menu is a direct result of our focus on vegan and plant-based innovation and goes hand in hand with our target of a % meat-free menu by , as well as our commitment to sustainability and responsible business. We can’t think of a more fitting way to re-launch our new-look flagship in Leicester Square.” The restaurant chain has committed to reducing emissions including those from purchased goods and services, capital distribution and waste generated in operations and franchises, with the new Leicester Square store being an example of this.Most Read Dont MissFollow MirrorFacebookTwitterComment MORE ON Burger King Inc.Food" data-immediate"data-immediate"Serve the food you really want to eat by signing up for our tips and recipes and never be bored by your cooking againSign UpInvalid EmailSomething went wrong, please try again later.We use your sign-up to provide content in ways youve consented to and to improve our understanding of you. title: what you test positive covid
story: What to doyou test positive for Covid - New rules and self isolation explainedHere we explain what to doyou test positive for Covid- now that self isolation rules and restrictions have ended and cases of coronavirus are rising in the UKSelf isolation rules have ended in the UK Image: Getty ImagesByAriane Sohrabi-ShirazSEO Editor:,  Mar |commentsCovid cases are rising in the UK, butyou catch the virus you donapost actually have to self isolate.All remaining coronavirus restrictions were lted in England on February , including self isolation rules for those who test positive with the virus.And from April  free lateral flow tests will no longer be provided for most people in England. So what exactly are the rules foryou test positive for coronavirus now  Here is everything you need to know. What to doyou test positive for Covid You are no longer required by law to self-isolateyou have Covid-. However, the NHS still recommends you stay at home and avoid contact with other people because this helps reduce the chance of passing Covid- on to others.You should consider staying at homeyou have any of the main symptoms of Covid- ofyou have tested positive for Covid-, which means you have the virus. Those who live in the save household as, or have had close contact with, someone who has Covid- also no longer need to self isolate. If you do have symptoms of coronavirus, you should order a PCR test. According to the NHS, these are a new, continuous cough, a loss of taste smell and or a high temperature.Prime Minister Boris Johnson said: We must learn to live with Covid in the same way we live with flu.The Test and Trace Support Payment Scheme has also ended. Can I go out exerciseI have Covid   Technically, in England you are allowed to leave the house for any reason. The government advice currently states: You will not be legally required to self-isolateyou test positive for Covid-. Isolation is at this time voluntary, and not mandatory. However, itaposs still recommended you donapost do these things, as you risk infecting other people. Whether or not you should be exercising at home when you have Covid is another matter. According to the NHS, itaposs important to stay active when recovering from Covid. It says: After a period of illness and inactivity, your muscles will be much weaker than normal and you will certainly be less fit than you were. “It is important to get back to your previous level of activity or possibly aim to be more active! “By being active and starting some exercise you become stronger and fitter. You may notice your tiredness increase and some breathlessness at first but these should improve the stronger you get this is a normal response to doing more exercise for all of us. Do pupils have to stay off school   Although there is no legal requirement for people with Covid to self isolate, the expectation is that pupils and staff who test positive are advised to stay at home for at least five full days. Then they should continue to follow the guidance until they have received two negative test results on consecutive days. Paul Whiteman, general secretary of school leadersapos union the NAHT said it was expected that the vast majority of families would follow the updated guidance and keep their child off schoolthey tested positive. title: woman caught drink driving says
story: Woman caught drink driving says she was fleeing man who came close as she ate Big MacHelena Monk, , says she panicked when she saw a man walk towards her pink Fiat  car while she was eating her McDonalds Big Mac burger and so drove back onto a country road to get away from himHelena Monk, a businesswoman caught driving whilst almost twice the alcohol limit Image: Cavendish PressLtdByAlice PeacockNews Reporter:,  Mar A woman caught drunk driving has claimed she was attempting to escape a mystery man who approached her car while she was eating a McDonald’s Big Mac. Helena Monk, , was parked on a side road eating the burger after going for dinner with a friend. She says she panicked when she saw the man walk towards her pink Fiat  car and drove onto a country road to get away from him.Police stopped her when they spotted her swerving around the carriageway with an internal light still switched on,Manchester Evening News reports.Stockport Magistrates Court heard how tests showed she was almost double the legal drink-drive limit. Monk, who lives in Hale, admitted drink driving and was banned from the roads for  months. She has initially applied for a special reasons hearing in which drink drivers cite exceptional hardship in an attempt to dodge a driving ban.  The incident happened on July  last year at .pm around  miles from Monkaposs flat, when police spotted her driving through the village of Mottram St Andrew near Alderley Edge. It was claimed Monk, who works as a textile designer and a recruitment agent, had been out for a meal and had dropped off her friend - but stopped at McDonaldaposs on her way home. She then pulled over at a nearby pub to eat it before setting off again. Prosecutor Peter Conroy said: A police constable on patrol described the defendant as swerving from side to side in the road. There was an internal light on in the car. The officer conducted checks on her number plate and used his emergency equipment to stop her. aposaposThe defendant pulled over and he could smell alcohol on her breath and could tell she was intoxicated.She then failed a roadside breath test and was arrested being taken to Middlewich custody suite. She was compliant with police throughout. There were no other passengers in the car and conditions were good, it was late at night. In mitigation defence lawyer James Street, who specialises in aposaposexceptional hardshipaposapos cases, said: My client was someone of previous good character and she has now lost that. She accepts she will now be disqualied and it will have a signicant impact on her in terms of circumstances. aposaposShe had been out for a meal and a drink and then dropped her friend off at their home, where she has had another drink.It is probably that drink which has put her over the legal limit. She was hungry later on and drove to McDonald’s to get a burger.She then started to drive off and realised it may be dficult to eat a burger whilst driving. aposaposShe parked down the side lane of the pub and noticed someone approaching behind her.She was a single woman in a car and was concerned. She felt threatened because a male was behind her, so she took the decision to drive off onto the main road and that is when the police saw her and she pulled into a side road and co-operated. Mr Street told the court his client normally works as a recruitment agent but due to lockdown, is currently not in work. He added: She is going to be much more limited in her ability now to find work after losing her license because of this. Monk was also ordered to pay a fine of £ and ordered to pay £ costs plus a £ victim surcharge. Read MoreRead More

title: worlds most luxurious dogs been
story: Exclusive: World’s most luxurious dogs have been kissed by Ariana Grande and Taylor SwtFamous pooches, Tinkerbelle and Belle, based in New York, USA, are on VIP celebrity guest lists, sit front row at Paris Fashion Week and even have their own one-of-a-kind Gucci dog collarsAriana Grande is just one of the A-list celebrities that adore Tinkerbelle and her baby sister Image: Sam CarrellByNia DaltonSpecialist Writer:,  Mar |comments Itaposs a Cinderella story for -year-old dog Tinkerbelle - once a shy rescue puppy, she is now a world-famous canine celebrity and has been kissed by the likes of Ariana Grande and Taylor Swt.Owner Sam Carrell, from New York, USA, rescued Tinkerbelle as a nine-month-old pup from a shelter a decade ago, and has since garnered her more than , online fans. The luxurious and lovable pooch has gone from rags to riches, and her new baby sister, Belle, is already following in her successful paw prints.Talking about her petsapos stardom, Sam told The Mirror : Many celebrities want to meet them and be photographed with them. Seeing their faces light up is unbelievable.  to our TeamDogs newsletter for your weekly dose of dog news, pictures and stories. Ten years ago, Sam took home a tiny papitesepuppy and named her Tinkerbelle after her tiny size. When she was just one year old, Tinkerbelle was scouted by a pet modelling agency in the streets of New York City. Her first modelling job was for Ralph Lauren, and she instantly became the face of the campaign. I remember seeing her in high fashion magazines, all over billboards and subways, Sam recalled.A stylist at the photo shoot insisted on creating a dog Instagram account for her. Thataposs where it all started.By saying yes to things on Tinkerbelleaposs journey, itaposs opened worlds for us both. Now, Tinkerbelle is veried on Instagram and her pet passport is stamped with trips from London, Paris, Italy, Mexico, The Bahamas and the Dominican Republic. I never expected her to become famous - it all happened by chance, Sam said. Itaposs been the most rewarding and amazing adventure. Her fame has even brought her a baby sister, after one of Tinkerbelleaposs fans begged Sam to adopt her papitese puppy.One-year-old Belle joined the family last year, and is already an official pup for the Empire State Building and featured on Saturday Night Live. Belle is the fiesty little one who constantly tries to play and annoy her older sister, Sam said. They both love the camera and people. The second they step onto the catwalk, their whole beings lights up. Tinkerbelleaposs acting and modelling career has led her to meet dozens of A-list celebrities, including Kevin Jonas and Whoopi Goldberg. Many of these famous faces recognise her in the street and get excited to scoop her up. When we were watching Taylor Swt perform live, Lizzo caught Tinkerbelle in the corner of her eye and said aposOMG there she isapos and grabbed her out of my arms, Sam explained.The pint-sized pup has walked in Paris Fashion Week and partnered with brands like Pixar, Disney, Amazon, Netflix and Universal Pictures.Her biggest achievement is being nominated for an EMMY Award, Sam said, alongside her Webby Award, Shorty Award and Silver W Award. The poochaposs biggest brand deal is her most recent partnership with Super Bowl for Puppy Bowl.My favourite campaign is her Le Marca Prosecco shoot. It was so a and glam. The set-up was modelled like Breakfast at Tfanyaposs, Sam said. Itaposs no surprise that the doggy duo have an impressive cabinet of clothing and accessories at home. These two have more clothes than I do, and much better designer brands, Sam said. From pet pyjamas to sunglasses, hats and shoes - they have it all, and never need to wear anything twice. Once theyaposre photographed in something, I have to switch it up and rotate, Sam explained. Their most expensive designer items are real Gucci dog collars - which were made especially for them by the fashion giant. They donapost even make dog collars but Tinkerbelle did a modelling job and they made her one. Theyaposre like tiny Gucci belts with the GG buckle, Sam said. We have three in pink, red and black. When Tinkerbelle isnapost strutting her couture wardrobe down a Hollywood runway or jetting off on a lavish trip, youaposll find her curled up asleep at home with Sam. My dogs mean more to me than anyone or anything, she said. They are taken care of before I take care of myself. I canapost imagine my le without them.You can keep up-to-date with Tinkerbelle and Belle on their Instagram, Facebook and TikTok. title: i make 50k selling used
story: I make £k selling used tights - I dont care what people think, it pays my billsA mum-of-three was left struggling for money during the pandemic, so came up with an alternative means of raking in the cash, selling her XL tights for £ a pair through OnlyFansLizzy now wants to help others who might still be struggling to gain more financial control Image: Jam Press @lizzylonglegsByJulia BanimAudience WriterOlive Loveridge-Greene:,  Mar |comments A Cornwall-based mum-of-three was left struggling for money, after the effects of the coronavirus pandemic paired with the rising cost of living made things dficult for her and her family. However, she has since found an alternative - and very lucrative - source of income by selling her XL tights for £ a pop through adult content  OnlyFans. Lizzy Groombridge - who stands at a very tall ft in - says sheaposs raked in £, through selling her y patterned tights since starting up her business some  months ago, earning nearly twice the average UK wage.Lizzy, of Camborne, Cornwall, says that demand for her product has been so high that sheaposs had to take weekly trips to Primark and other shops to keep stocked up on tights for her -inch legs.  Get the news you want straight to your inbox.for a Mirror newsletter here.The -year-old said: I enjoy it and I donapost care what others think. Their opinions donapost pay my bills. The idea came about when people started approaching me on TikTok. I do a lot of videos relating to my height and I wear tights in them. I had people messaging me askingthey could buy them from me. Iaposm reliant on myself I thought Iaposd run with the idea and see how it went.Lizzy - who boasts more than , followers on her TikTok channel @lizzylonglegs - has since become somewhat of a local celeb in her area, and is regularly recognised by people while out and about.Her popularity is now so great that Lizzy can sell approximately  pairs of tights in a  day period. Having recently undergone breast enhancement surgery, she hopes that demand will soar even higher.According to Lizzy: In the space of a fortnight I sell around  but it can y. Itaposs opened my eyes up to areas of desires I never knew existed but Iaposm open-minded. However, caring for three children while creating adult content isnapost always easier, with Lizzy admitting that being an OnlyFans creator certainly has its hard moments. Lizzy explained: Iaposm only human I become overwhelmed with requests or I have days where I have personal hang-ups but I use my s to push me and give me more confidence, but also show others that you can go from the ground up. Iaposm showing others you can reach your dreams and take risks because you only live once and itaposs worth it. She added: I only want to be able to provide for my kids and letaposs face it where am I going to have the same opportunity to make money. This is my full-time job now and Iaposm hoping to get in the top % of TikTok accounts now that Iaposve had my boob job. Iaposm making a separate page to help other women get started and how to promote [their pages] etc, as I get a lot of people turning to me asking how Iaposve done it and grown so quickly. So I can help others gain more financial control of their lives too.Do you have an OnlyFans-related story to share  We pay for stories. news weird-news im-catfish-queen-can-make-"Catfish leaves TikTok users in shock with incredible transformationByJulia BanimAudience WriterKatie Dollard:,  Mar |comments A self-professed aposcatfishapos has taken people aback with her astonishing transformations, using clever make-up techniques to appear decades younger. -year-old Patricia Lichtenberger works as a bench jeweller but has also amassed a loyal following on TikTok, where she has risen as a popular beauty influencer.Patricia started her TikTok back in  to showcase her sense of humour and creative talents. After posting vids showing off her natural look vs her with glam make-up, Patricia found herself getting ious comments which referred to her as a catfish. She has since come to embrace this title and, following one recently uploaded video thataposs clocked up more than . million views, her fans have been left completely mesmerised by her aposCatfish Queenapos abilities. Get the news you want straight to your inbox.for a Mirror newsletter here. Reflecting on some of the harsh comments sheaposs previously received, Patricia said: Back when I started posting my makeup videos and people called me ugly or would say aposwhat’s wrong with your face apos, they then called me a Catfish and I knew what that was, but that wasn’t my mission. I wanted to share my before and after videos, because for so long, those words cut so much and you get into depression until you can finally get up and turn those negative comments into something bittersweet. So that day, I decided to make that video to show them so yeah, I guess I am a Catfish! Words stopped hurting me and my TikTok Tribe fans backed me up because they know what I’ve been through!Patricia posted her aposcatfishapos video on September , , showing a before and after transformation, from natural hair and bare face to full make-up and styled hair. One baffled follower refused to believe they were even looking at the same person, declaring that it was not even the same girl, while another gasped, How did she go from -year-old to -year-old  Make-up is the true CAP, Be careful men. A third person wrote: So many people are saying itaposs not the same girl, it is she has the same tattoo on her right arm. You are beautul with or without makeup by the way! Considering the reaction to her vid, Patricia remarked: There is no such thing as perfect, let’s be real, we all have skin texture and this is so surreal that we’d all think we are made of robots or something because we are not. Makeup is not illegal, we enhance our beauty and we all are artistic so why take the fun out of that  I can go from a Simple makeup look to dramatic sometimes so the comments from my supporters have my back, they still do till this day. title: im paying 30k sisters wedding
story: Im paying £k for my sisters wedding - now my stepsister wants funding tooA man has said hes prepared to part with £, to help fund his sisters lavish wedding - but now his stepsister is jealous that he wont do the same for herThe man is paying £, for his sisters wedding Image: Getty ImagesByZahna EklundAudience writer:,  Mar |commentsIf you have a large family, it can be dficult to split your time and resources evenly so that everyone feels equally loved and appreciated by you - especiallythere are members you get on with better than others.But one man on Reddit has caused a stir in his family dynamic after he offered to pay an eye-watering amount of money toward his sisteraposs wedding, as heaposs refused to do the same for his stepsister.Sharing his story anonymously, the man said heaposs committing around £, for his sister to have the wedding of her dreams, but he wonapost be giving a penny to his stepsister - as theyaposre not close and he doesnapost consider her family.Get the news you want straight to your inbox.for a Mirror newsletter here. And while the man feels justied in his actions, his stepsister is upset with him and has even spoken to her stepdad - and the manaposs biological dad - to try and get him to be more generous. He wrote: My sister is about to get married. I love my sister a lot and I knew that for her wedding I would definitely help pay for it. Itaposs something I always wanted to do. I do well for myself and I love my sister so I splurged a little bit. Iaposve decided to commit about k to her wedding. My sister didnapost ask this of me, it was my own personal choice. My stepsister moved in with us when I was  and she was . At  I moved off to university. We didnapost have a particularly close relationship during that time. We are cordial with one another when we meet each other during family gatherings but donapost really have a close relationship.  My stepsister is also getting married and was upset when she realised I wasnapost contributing anything to her wedding. Sheaposs now got my dad to come and talk to me about being generous and frankly not putting him in a bad spot. I really donapost want to give her money for her wedding because I donapost know her well enough. What do I do  Commenters on the Reddit post were quick to tell the man heaposs under no obligation to pay for his stepsisteraposs wedding, as he can use his money however he chooses. One person said: Just tell her no and stay firm. Itaposs odd she felt entitled to you paying, but not close enough that she could talk to you about it herself. She had to leverage daddy into doing the dirty work. While another added: Tell your dad that traditionally the parents cover the wedding, so itaposs on him. Your contribution to your other sister was a large wedding gt you chose due to your closeness but is not a requirement nor a responsibility of yours. And a third wrote: She just wants to use you as a free wedding ride and misrecognised your generosity to your sister as some sort of a more mandatory gesture. Don’t give in to the power trip. You don’t need to explain your position. Just beware of your stepsister retaliating by not inviting you to her wedding.Do you have a story to sell  Get in touch with us at yourmirror@trinitymirror .Read MoreRead More Most Read Dont MissFollow MirrorFacebookTwitterComment MORE ON RedditMarriageWeddingsUmm what " data-immediate"data-immediate" to FREE email alerts with news to brighten your daySubscribeInvalid EmailSomething went wrong, please try again later.We use your sign-up to provide content in ways youve consented to and to improve our understanding of you. title: im step mum 24 people
story: I became a step-mum at  - people often think my husbands daughter is my twin sisterA young step-mum has shared how she constantly has people askingher husbands daughter is her twin sister as theyre close in age - but she say this allows her to connect with the children "on a dferent level"Savanna says it is hilarious when people mistake her for her daughters twin Image: Caters News AgencyByLiam GilliverOpinion WriterBeth Kilgallon:,  Mar Updated:,  Mar |comments A young woman who became a step-mum at  says sheaposs often mistaken as her daughteraposs twin sister by strangers.Savanna Chapin, who is now , is only six years older than her stepdaughter Tizzi and the pair, from Arizona, US, both have long blonde hair and share a similar fashion sense - making them look even more alike. Savanna, who works as a hairstylist, says while she never imagined becoming a step mum at such a young age she wouldnapost change it for the world. She explained: I found it stressful that there was only six years dference between me and my eldest stepdaughter because I know I probably wouldnapost have been the nicest to my dadaposs new girlfriendI was in her situation. But being close in age with Tizzi has made us close than ever. We do everything together.  Donapost miss out on big stories with big heart. Share your email for all the latest daily news, sport, showbiz and more from the Mirror Savanna described the sheer shock on peopleaposs faces when they find out theyaposre not siblings as hilarious and thinks their almost identical wardrobe choices is what makes them look even more like twins She also says her close age to Tizzi has made their relationship stronger because she can relate to the stuff sheaposs going through. There isnapost anything she hasnapost told me, Savanna explains. Weaposre like a ball and chain. We are always together. She was even in the delivery room with me when I had my first son...  Being a younger step mum means I have the ability to connect with the kids on a dferent level. I can be more of a friend or mentor, rather than a parental figure. They can come to me with all of their problems. Savanna also became a step mum to Tayge, now , and Trinity, now  when she married her husband in Chris. The couple, who started dating in , have since had two children of their own, Tripp and Traxx. When I fell pregnant, I was full of a mixture of emotions. I was excited and nervous because I didnapost want the other kids to feel like they were being replaced, Savanna added. But Tripp and Traxx have really tied the family together. Itaposs beautul.Do you have a story to share  We pay for stories. story: I was temporarily blinded and scarred by freckle tattoo - Ill get more ink thoughDespite suffering temporary blindness and scarring after an attempt at tattooing faux-freckles on her face, Tilly Whitfeld hasnt been put off trying other proceduresThe star has baffled fans by opting for yet another cosmetic procedure Image: @tillywhitfeld TikTokByLiam GilliverOpinion Writer:,  Mar |comments A woman who was temporarily blinded in one eye from getting aposfrecklesapos tattooed on her face has sparked concern amongst her fans once again. Former Big Brother Australia star Tilly Whitfeld tried to give herself faux-freckles with an at-home acupuncture treatment, using brown tattoo ink she bought from eBay.However, she was left with severe burns due to the ink containing high levels of lead. The influencer has since spent more than £, to find a solution but is still left with permanent scarring across her cheeks.Showing her , TikTok followers the results of her laser removal for her bodged tatts, Whitfeld said : Itaposs fully bruised and there are blood blisters everywhere.Donapost tattoo your face, donapost do anything to your face.  Would you ever get faux-freckles tattooed on your face  Let us know your thoughts on the beauty trend in the comments section belowDespite the staraposs stark warning, yesterday she shared a video of herself undergoing yet another procedure. The -year-old fashion student posted a TikTok while she was having her lips tattooed, in what is commonly known as a aposlip blushapos procedure. This consists of depositing pigments into your lips using small needles to add colour to them. It typically lasts between two to three years and has become more popular over recent years.The video, which garnered a whopping , views in less than  hours, stirred opinions online - with many fans expressing concern over Whitfieldaposs decision. You seriously doing this after the freckles girl  No, one user wrote. Another added: Yep, you will never learn. A third wrote: Itaposs your choice but I think youaposre gorgeous the way you are. title: i worked hard dream home
story: I worked so hard to get dream home - but mother-in-law is ruining it and my marriageA woman has confessed her concern that her marriage might be in dangerher mother-in-law continues living with her family, but shes not sure what to do to make le betterThe older woman is ruining her home for herImage: Getty Images iStockphotoByCourtney PochinSenior Audience Writer:,  Mar |commentsNo matter whether you have the best relationship with your in-laws or the worst, itaposs likely you donapost want them to be living with you. But one woman has found herself in a dficult position after her mother-in-law moved in with her family and seems to want to stay forever.Writing anonymously on Mumsnet, the parent explained that sheaposs in her s, married with two primary school-aged children. She told how her mother-in-law had gone though a nasty orce and been forced to sell her home - but she couldnapost afford to buy another property in the area.So sheaposd moved in with her son, but the woman has had enough of their living situation and wants to reclaim her aposdream homeapos for herself. Her post read: Am I being unreasonable to not want to live with my MIL   Get the news you want straight to your inbox. for a Mirror newsletter here. She now lives with us and thereaposs no other alternative as she has no money. However, Iaposm finding it harder to enjoy my home and worried itaposs going to break up my marriage.Iaposm the breadwinner although husband works. He does more childcare and housework as I work long hours. When I come home I want to relax and enjoy bedtime with the kids and an evening with husband without my MIL always being there.She hoards everything from her old house meaning we have bedrooms full of her boxes that we canapost access.I just want to be a normal family with our own space and privacy.If all this werenapost enough, the woman goes on to say that sheaposs feeling resentful that her mother-in-law is able to live without a job or any expenses in her house because of her good income. She continued: If I could go back Iaposd never say it was ok for her to live with us but now she has no means to live alone I guess Iaposm trapped. Husband knows where Iaposm coming from but neither of us can see an alternative. AIBU to want a home of my own without my MIL or am I selfish and just need to accept this is my le  Sometimes I feel like saying we need to sell up and buy two smaller propertiesbut this is our dream home and Iaposve worked bloody hard to get where I am professionally and I donapost want to move because she made bad financial decisions. More than  people responded to the post, with many encouraging the woman to get the MIL out. One person replied: Housing associations local council may help with sheltered accommodation. Seeyou can get her on the waiting list locally. Another said: Oh that is really tricky. Could you look at building her a granny annexe with its own little living room and kitchen, so she had her own space and so do you  I think itaposs such a dficult one becauseit were my mum Iaposd have her move in with us in a heartbeat, but having my MIL living with us would be really hard for me . A third wrote: Omg you bloody Saint. I’d be resentful too and it would end up destroying my marriage. Does DH have any siblings  Can’t she go spend at least part of the year with them and be a travelling MIL What would you do in this situation  Let us know in the comments below.Read MoreRead More Most Read Dont MissFollow MirrorFacebookTwitterComment MORE ON ViralMarriage" data-immediate"data-immediate" to FREE email alerts with news to brighten your daySubscribeInvalid EmailSomething went wrong, please try again later.We use your sign-up to provide content in ways youve consented to and to improve our understanding of you. title: worlds largest potato called doug
story: Worlds largest potato called Doug isnt actually a spud as record hopes crushedThe potato dug up by Guinness World Records hopefuls Colin and Donna Craig-Brown, from New Zealand’s Waikato region, discovered the monstrous .kg potato in their vegetable garden in AugustDug the potato was dug up by Colin and Donna Craig-Brown, from New Zealand’s Waikato region, last August Image: Sky NewsByAlice PeacockNews Reporter:,  Mar |comments The verdict is in on the “world’s largest potato” and it’s now apparent that Dug the spud is in fact a dferent vegetable altogether. The “potato” was dug up by Colin and Donna Craig-Brown, from New Zealand’ s Waikato region, last August. They suspected ‘Dug’ to be the world’s biggest spud and were waiting to hear back from Guiness World Records to seetheir “potato was actually the world’s heaviest, after sending a sample of the UK for DNA testing. But according to an email from Guinness World Records received by the couple on Sunday, the Science  Advice for Scottish Agriculture SASA found the DNA sample taken showed the specimen was not a potato.Instead, the .kg tuber is a type of gourd. For that reason, the Craig-Brown’s application for the World Records was disqualied.  Speaking to Stuff on Monday, Colin said he was “disappointed”. “Itaposs been a real roller-coaster of potato-rama,” he said. We hopped on the roller-coaster eyes wide open and enjoyed the ride and this was the last real twist.” Colin said he was “trying to rationalise” how the confusion had happened. The only logical explanation he could think of, he said, wasthe seedling he purchased was crossbred with a gourd and a cucumber.  Speaking to Stuff last year shortly after the discovery of the monstrous tuber, Colin said the “potato” was their “happy little mistake of nature”. It’s a hideous looking creature,” Colin had said. “It’s the sort of thing that only a mother could love.” The couple think the potato is self-sown and could have been growing for a couple of years or more. Whilst they awaited confirmation to seeDoug will take his place in the annals of history, they have built a small cart to tow the potato around town and show it off.  Speaking now of the confusion, Colin said it was a mystery to him why it grew so big, and why it tasted and looked like a potato. “If it quacks like a duck, swims like a duck and has feathers on it, then it must be a duck. “But nah – this one turned out to be a turkey.” Colin said his hopes hadn’t been crushed completely. He was now inspired to “really get stuck in” growing his potatoes. “I’m really gonna give it my all and have a go at growing the biggest potato in the world,” he said. The current heaviest potato was found in Britain in  and weight only just under kg, far less than Doug. title: inside horror dog meat market
story: Exclusive: Inside horror dog meat market where caged pets are sold beside bats after dying in agonyHarrowing video obtained by the Dog Meat-Free Indonesiacoalition shows gang members treating animals horrically before selling them for meat at wet markets alongside bats and snakesThe gruesome scene in the Tomohon Market in Sulawesi, IndonesiaByNada FarhoudEnvironment editor:,  Mar  coalition shows gang members treating animals horrically before selling them for meat at wet markets alongside bats and snakes" data-content-image"https:i-prod.mirror incoming article.ece ALTERNATES s _Tomohon-Market-Sulawesi-Indonesia--December-.jpg" data-tracking"facebook|share|top" coalition shows gang members treating animals horrically before selling them for meat at wet markets alongside bats and snakes" data-content-image"https:i-prod.mirror incoming article.ece ALTERNATES s _Tomohon-Market-Sulawesi-Indonesia--December-.jpg" data-tracking"twitter|share|top" coalition shows gang members treating animals horrically before selling them for meat at wet markets alongside bats and snakes" data-content-image"https:i-prod.mirror incoming article.ece ALTERNATES s _Tomohon-Market-Sulawesi-Indonesia--December-.jpg" data-tracking"whatsapp|share|top"|comments Gangs are stealing and brutally killing thousands of pet and roaming dogs from Indonesian villages to sell for meat at wet markets alongside bats, cats and snakes.Footage obtained by members of the Dog Meat-Free Indonesiacoalition who infiltrated the gang, shows men using long metal pincers to trap the dogs, clamping down on their bodies and necks before dragging them along the floor and throwing them into cages. The traffickers can also be seen hoisting terried and screaming dogs from an underground pit as they are repeatedly bludgeoned across the face and head. Other scenes at the markets show cages of dogs huddling together as nearby the leless bodies of other dogs are blowtorched to remove their fur for sale to customers. Some dogs being blowtorched are visibly still alive during the ordeal.Dog and cat meat can be seen being sold alongside bush meat including bats, snakes and wild boar in scenes similar to those found at Wuhan, China where the SARS-CoV- virus is believed to have originated, risking public health. The majority of Indonesia’s Muslim population do not eat dog meat but it is popular in areas like Sulawesi, where it is an inexpensive delicacy. A dish containing dog meat can be bought at a market for around , – , IDR which is roughly , the same price as a cup of coffee. Campaigners say the low price point helps to keep the cruelty going at the scale exposed by the investigation. Deadly rabies – a zoonotic disease endemic throughout Sulawesi – has also been linked to Asia’s dog meat trade by the World Health Organisation. Across Indonesia, an estimated one million dogs are killed for their meat annually. While a crackdown on the trade is being seen in parts of Indonesia such as Central Java, authorities in Sulawesi – a , square mile island with a population of nearly million people - have failed to act. Some dogs are trafficked from as far away as Makassar, South Sulawesiaposs capital, a -hour gruelling journey covering , miles.  An investigator for DMFI - which comprises local campaigners Jakarta Animal Aid Network and Animals Friends Jogja, and international groups Humane Society International, Four Paws and Animals Asia – infiltrated gangs who stole an estimated , pet and roaming dogs every month from villages. They are then sold by traffickers to kill and sell for meat at local restaurants and at wet markets such as Langowan, Tomohon and Kawangkoan in the north. Some dogs are trafficked from as far away as Makassar, South Sulawesiaposs capital, a -hour gruelling journey covering , miles. Lola Webber, End Dog Meat campaigns director at Humane Society International, said: “This is some of the worst animal cruelty we have seen -- gangs and traders stealing and bludgeoning thousands of terried, screaming dogs every month from villages, many beloved family companions. “They are torn away and abused by these criminals in broad daylight, scared and helpless. All of this to be sold for their meat in restaurants and at wet markets on display alongside bats, snakes and wild boar. As shocking as our investigation is, it’s just a snapshot of the horrying scale of this trade. “Despite the serious public health risks associated with these markets, Sulawesi’s roughly  traditional markets are still operating business as usual.With Indonesia still in the grip of the COVID- pandemic, with its origins in wildle wet markets in China just the same as we see in North Sulawesi, it is a matter of urgency that President Widodo take action immediately to stop this dangerous and illegal trade.” The DMFI investigator, who is not being named for his own safety, said: “The scale of the dog meat trade was really surprising. Thieves are stealing dogs from all over the island before selling them to the traders who warehouse them until they have enough to take to market. “Mentally, this was a harrowing mission because every day I could see how utterly terried and traumatised these poor dogs were. All around them, they witness other dogs being dragged by the neck, beaten over the head, thrown around violently. They would tremble in fear when approached. “Like me, the vast majority of Indonesians will be sickened by what I saw. This trade brings shame on Indonesia.” Indonesia’s President Joko Widodo now faces fresh pressure to shut down the country’s brutal dog meat trade after sickening scenes reveals horric animal cruelty. After viewing the footage, Lord Goldsmith, minister for animal welfare said: This footage is so deeply shocking. I have written to the ambassador urging the government of Indonesia to take stronger steps to stop this appalling cruelty The DMFI is now calling for immediate action to crack down on the trade. In November last year campaigners joined Sukoharjo police in Java on a sting operation at an illegal dog slaughterhouse that saw more than  dogs rescued.The dog meat trade: The facts Opinion polls show that only a small minority of Indonesia’s populationconsume dog meat and only a very small number of those involved in the trade rely on dog meat as their main source of income. Although demand for dog meat is higher in Sulawesi than the rest of Indonesia, latest opinion polling by Ninconfirms that only % of Sulawesians consume dogs. Dog meat is mostly eaten by certain ethnic groups such as the Minahasa people of North Sulawesi where there are  markets collectively selling around  live and slaughtered dogs per day, amounting to more than , dogs every year. In  President Joko Widodo received a letter from DMFI calling for action, and signed by more than  national and international celebrities including Simon Cowell, Sophia Latjuba, Yeslin Wang, Nadia Mulya, Lawrence Enzela, Cameron Diaz, Cha Islan, Ellen DeGeneres and Pierce Brosnan. Across Asia, opposition to the dog and cat meat trades is increasing, with an ever-growing number of countries and territoriesbanning the trade in and slaughter, sale and consumption of dogs. In South Korea, a task force has been set up by the government to discuss a dog meat ban following a suggestion by President Moon Jae-in.Read MoreRead More Most Read Dont MissFollow MirrorFacebookTwitterComment MORE ON Stock marketAnimalsSars" data-immediate"data-immediate"Get email updates with the days biggest storiesInvalid EmailSomething went wrong, please try again later.We use your sign-up to provide content in ways youve consented to and to improve our understanding of you. news world-news model-who-called-putin-psychopath-"Russia: Killer of model Gretta Vedler arrestedByWill StewartRussia Correspondent:,  Mar Updated:,  Mar |comments The corpse of a Russian model has been found stashed in a suitcase more than a year after she went missing following her criticism of Vladimir Putin. Gretta Vedler, , was killed a month after she posted on social media calling Putin a “psychopath” and forecasting his drive to “enhance the integrity of Russiawould end in tears.Her “jealous” ex-boyfriend Dmitry Korovin, , has confessed more than a year later to strangling her to death after a row over money in Moscow unrelated to her political views and analysis of Putin’s mind and motives. He told interrogators that he slept in a hotel room for three nights with her corpse which he put in a newly-bought suitcase. Follow all the latest updates from Ukraine in our live blogThen he drove her body  miles to Lipetsk region and left it in the boot of a car for more than a year. He kept posting pictures and messages on the model’s social media, to make friends believe she was still alive, he told detectives.A male friend called Evgeniy Foster - a blogger in Kharkiv, the Ukrainian city blitzed by Russian forces - became suspicious found a friend in Moscow to file a missing person case, triggering a search which eventually located her body. A video from Russia’s Investigative Committee shows Korovin allegedly demonstrating how he killed the model, and making a full confession. Her prescient postings on Putin in January , a month before she was murdered, are not seen as connected to her death but are chilling in the light of subsequent events. She was concerned over his crackdown on protests and what she saw as a desire to forge a bigger Russia.  Want all the latest news and analysis from Ukraine to our World News Bulletinhere“Given the fact that Putin went through a lot of humiliation in childhood, he could not stand up for himself due to his [slight] physical form, it is not surprising that he left after law school and joined the KGB,” she wrote. “Such people are timid and fearful from childhood, afraid of noise and darkness, strangers, so traits such as caution, restraint, and lack of communication are developed early in their character. “I can only assume, in my opinion, a clear psychopathy or sociopathy is seen in him.” She told her followers: “For psychopaths, it is important to constantly experience a sense of fullness and sharpness of le, so they love risk, intense experiences, intense communication, intense activity - an intense and dynamic le. “Maybe he really wants to enhance the integrity of Russia and sincerely wishes the good for the Russians. “But can he really do anything  She made clear she had grave doubts. “I think you know the answer to this question yourself,” she posted. title: russians only two weeks left
story: Russians have only two weeks left of fight with Putin on the run, claims expertReports say that Russians are now facing serious shortages of manpower and supplies which means theyre only likely able to keep up the fight in Ukraine for another  to  daysRussian troops have only two weeks of fight left, it is claimed Image: Anadolu Agency via Getty ImagesByTim HanlonNews Reporter:,  Mar |commentsUkrainian resistance has put the Russian army on the run and a growing shortage of resources means they wonapost be able to keep up the fight for more than two weeks, it is claimed. Russia has failed to make the big inroads it is thought they were expecting and are making slow progress in trying to topple the Ukraine regime in Kyiv. They are slowly encircling the Ukraine capital but it is thought now that the inability to make decisive blows means that they will run out of manpower and energy sooner rather than later.Now, a senior UK defence source is reported to have said that Ukraine has Russia on the run and the attacker was running out of both manpower and energy. The source told the Daily Mail: As long as we keep pressing theyaposve got  to  days before reaching their culminating point. Thataposs when the strength of Ukraineaposs resistance should become greater than Russiaaposs attacking force.A similar view to the Mail source, where Russia will be forced to call a halt to their invasion by May, was held by Oleksiy Arestovich, an adviser to the Ukrainian presidentaposs chief of staff, speaking late on Monday. In a video published by Ukrainian media, Arestovich said the exact timing of a withdrawal would depend on how much resources the Kremlin was willing to commit to the campaign. I think that no later than in May, early May, we should have a peace agreement, maybe much earlier, we will see, I am talking about the latest possible dates, Arestovich said.  We are at a fork in the road now: there will either be a peace deal struck very quickly, within a week or two, with troop withdrawal and everything, or there will be an attempt to scrape together some, say, Syrians for a round two and, when we grind them too, an agreement by mid-April or late April. A completely crazy scenario could also involve Russia sending fresh conscripts after a month of training, he said.Still, even once peace is agreed, small tactical clashes could remain possible for a year, according to Arestovich, although Ukraine insists on the complete removal of Russian troops from its territory. The war in Ukraine began on February  when Vladimir Putin launched what he called a special military operation, the biggest attack on a European state since World War Two. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky gave a nightly address where he talked of the Russian forces suffering devastating losses and he tried to get their soldiers to surrender. Therefore, I offer you a choice. On behalf of the Ukrainian people, I give you a chance. Chance to survive, he said. If you surrender to our forces, we will treat you the way people are supposed to be treated. As people, decently. In a way you were not treated in your army. And in a way your army does not treat ours. Choose! Our brave defenders continue to inflict devastating losses on Russian troops. Soon the number of downed helicopters of Russia will reach hundreds of units. They have already lost  warplanes. Hundreds of tanks and thousands of other units of equipment. In  days, the Russian army has lost more in Ukraine than in two bloody and years-long wars in Chechnya. news world-news russia-shares-footage-mph-zircon-"Russian test launches Zircon hypersonic missileByWill StewartRussia CorrespondentGraeme Murray:,  Mar Updated:,  Mar |comments Russia has released chilling new footage showing how Vladimir Putin could launch a lightning hypersonic nuclear strike on the West.A Mach  “unstoppable” Zircon - or Tsirkon - missile is seen being fired from the Admiral Gorshkov frigate in the White Sea.The footage was revealed amid veiled threats Putin and his top officials could go nuclearany country intervenes with his invasion of Ukraine.In the early hours of February , he warned of “consequences that you have never faced in your history”, evidently alluding to his willingness to use a nuclear strike. At the weekend, in his ongoing decimation of Ukraine, he hit a military facility close to the Polish border, bringing the war to NATO’s doorstep.  The Zircon - or Tsirkon - is being rushed into service this year after what Putin has described as successful tests. Russian experts say the missile has “no analogues” in the West. TV Zvezda - a channel owned by the Russian defence ministry - said of the footage: “The Russian Zircon hypersonic missileaposs stealth features have been disclosed… “The speed of the Zircon hypersonic missile is so high that it prevents the opponentaposs air defence system from detecting its impact in time. “In fact, its launch will be known only after the target has been hit.” The missile also has “iable trajectory” to avoid detection, viewers were told. “No one will see the missile launch or its flight. They will only see when the missile hits the target,” said the frigate’s commander, first rank captain Igor Krokhmal.  “A surface target, a coastal target. I donapost think there will be anything to counter this in the next few years.” Putin said in December: “Zircon are our newest missiles fired from the sea at sea targets, and land targets. “The tests were carried out successfully, flawlessly.“This is a big event for our country, a signicant step in improving Russia ’s security, in increasingdefence capability.”It is now in “serial production”, and he has previously called the weapon “truly unparalleled…in the world”.  While the footage is only released now, it is believed to date from December, and possibly had been deliberately held back for later to send chills through the West. At the time, Putin had boasted a salvo launch, but no footage was released. The latest launch coincided with a Kalibr missile launch from the same warship. The Zircon has been hailed by Moscow’s state-controlled TV as Putin’s weapon of choice to wipe out American cities in the event of an atomic conflict. However, its range has been put around  miles, although Krohmal has said it can strike at targets at a distance of  miles. It will initially be deployed from Russian frigates and later from submarines.  Kremlin deputy premier Yury Borisov has said that Russia had outpaced the West in hypersonic weapons - and intends to maintain its lead. He said: “We have broken forward, specically, in the sphere of hypersonic weapons andbased on new physical principles. “We now have serious advantages in this regard over the leading Western countries - and will try to maintain this position.” In Putin’s statement at the start of the war, he said: “A few words to those who might be tempted to interfere in the unfolding events from the outside. Anyone who tries to hinder us and... creates a threat for our country and our people must know that the response will be immediate and will lead to consequences that you have never faced in your history. We are ready for any scenario. All necessary decisions in this regard have been taken. I hope you hear me.” Read MoreRead More Most Read Dont MissFollow MirrorFacebookTwitterComment MORE ON Vladimir PutinRussia Ukraine war" data-immediate"data-immediate"Get email updates with the days biggest storiesInvalid EmailSomething went wrong, please try again later.We use your sign-up to provide content in ways youve consented to and to improve our understanding of you. news world-news woman-who-stormed-onto-russian-"Russian news broadcast interrupted by war protestByAlahna KindredNews Reporter:,  Mar |comments The brave woman who stormed a Russian TV news segment with an anti-war message has gone missing, according to reports.Marina Ovsyannikova, an employee of state-controlled Channel One interrupted newsreader Ekaterina Andreeva last night as she was delivering her evening bulletin.She jumped into the background with a placard warning viewings not to believe the propaganda being broadcast.Marina was detained last night by police and as of this morning, her lawyers were unable to locate her, according to reports. Marina is going to be charged with “publicly spreading knowingly  information about the Russian armed forces” and could face a sentence of up to  years in prison, the FTaposs Moscow Bureau chief Max Seddon tweeted this morning.Want all the latest news and analysis from Ukraine to our World News Bulletin here However, her location remains unclear. Last night, Marinaaposs placard read stop the war, donapost believe propaganda, theyaposre lying to you. Producers quickly scrambled to cut her off and flip to B-roll for the viewers at home. Her message was written in Russian and English aimed at the channelaposs millions of viewers - but producers quickly switched the broadcast to a clip of a hospital as they dealt with the situation. Follow all todayaposs latest updates on the conflict with our live blog Before she stormed the news segment it appeared she recorded a video beforehand where she apologised for her work on Russian state TV and blamed Vladimir Putin for the war. In the video, she said: Whataposs happening in Ukraine is a crime, and Russia is the aggressor. The responsibility for this aggression lies with one man: Vladimir Putin.My father is Ukrainian, my mother is Russian, and they were never enemies. This necklace [shows] Russia must stop this fratricidal war.  Unfortunately, for the last few years, Iaposve been working for Channel One. Iaposve been doing Kremlin propaganda and Iaposm very ashamed of it – that I let people lie from TV screens and allowed the Russian people to be zombied. We didnapost say anything in  when it only just began. We didnapost protest when the Kremlin poisoned Navalny. We just silently watched this inhuman regime. Now the whole world has turned away from us, and ten generations of our descendants wonapost wash off this fratricidal war. Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has praised Marina for her brave actions.In a video shared on Telegra, Zelensky said: I am grateful to those Russians who do not stop trying to convey the truth. To those who fight disinformation and tell the truth, real facts to their friends and loved ones. He then addressed Marina directly and added: To those who are not afraid to protest. As long as your country has not completely closed itself off from the whole world, turning into a very large North Korea, you must fight. You must not lose your chance.
